verses.text: And the whole congregation of the children of Israel assembled together \add at\add* Shiloh, and set up the tabernacle of the congregation there. And the land was subdued before them.
And there remained among the children of Israel seven tribes, which had not \add yet\add* received their inheritance.
And Joshua said unto the children of Israel, How long \add are\add* you slack to go to possess the land, which the \sc Lord\sc* God of your fathers hath given you?

Give out from among you three men for \add each\add* tribe: and I will send them, and they shall rise, and go through the land, and describe it according to the inheritance of them; and they shall come \add again\add* to me.
And they shall divide it into seven parts: Judah shall abide in their coast on the south, and the house of Joseph shall abide in their coasts on the north.
Ye shall therefore describe the land \add into\add* seven parts, and bring \add the description\add* hither to me, that I may cast lots for you here before the \sc Lord\sc* our God.

But the Levites have no part among you; for the priesthood of the \sc Lord\sc* \add is\add* their inheritance: and Gad, and Reuben, and half the tribe of Manasseh, have received their inheritance beyond Jordan on the east, which Moses the servant of the \sc Lord\sc* gave them.

And the men arose, and went away: and Joshua charged them that went to describe the land, saying, Go and walk through the land, and describe it, and come again to me, that I may here cast lots for you before the \sc Lord\sc* in Shiloh.
And the men went and passed through the land, and described it by cities into seven parts in a book, and came \add again\add* to Joshua to the host \add at\add* Shiloh.
And Joshua cast lots for them in Shiloh before the \sc Lord\sc*: and there Joshua divided the land unto the children of Israel according to their divisions.
And the lot of the tribe of the children of Benjamin came up according to their families: and the coast of their lot came forth between the children of Judah and the children of Joseph.

And their border on the north side was from Jordan; and the border went up to the side of Jericho on the north side, and went up through the mountains westward; and the goings out thereof were at the wilderness of Beth-aven.

And the border went over from thence toward Luz, to the side of Luz, which \add is\add* Beth-el, southward; and the border descended \add to\add* Ataroth-adar, near the hill that \add lieth\add* on the south side of the nether Beth-horon.

And the border was drawn \add thence\add*, and compassed the corner of the sea southward, from the hill that \add lieth\add* before Beth-horon southward; and the goings out thereof were at Kirjath-baal, which \add is\add* Kirjath-jearim, a city of the children of Judah: this \add was\add* the west quarter.
And the south quarter \add was\add* from the end of Kirjath-jearim, and the border went out on the west, and went out to the well of waters of Nephtoah:

and the border came down to the end of the mountain that \add lieth\add* before the valley of the son of Hinnom, \add and\add* which \add is\add* in the valley of the giants on the north, and descended \add to\add* the valley of Hinnom, to the side of Jebusi on the south, and descended \add to\add* En-rogel,

and was drawn from the north, and went forth \add to\add* En-shemesh, and went forth toward Geliloth, which \add is\add* over against the going up of Adummim, and descended \add to\add* the stone of Bohan the son of Reuben,
and passed along toward the side over against Arabah northward, and went down unto Arabah:
and the border passed along to the side of Beth-hoglah northward: and the outgoings of the border were at the north bay of the salt sea at the south end of Jordan: this \add was\add* the south coast.
And Jordan was the border of it on the east side. This \add was\add* the inheritance of the children of Benjamin, by the coasts thereof round about, according to their families.
Now the cities of the tribe of the children of Benjamin according to their families were Jericho, and Beth-hoglah, and the valley of Keziz,
and Beth-arabah, and Zemaraim, and Beth-el,
and Avim, and Parah, and Ophrah,
and Chephar-haammonai, and Ophni, and Gaba; twelve cities with their villages.
Gibeon, and Ramah, and Beeroth,
and Mizpeh, and Chephirah, and Mozah,
and Rekem, and Irpeel, and Taralah,

and Zelah, Eleph, and Jebusi, which \add is\add* Jerusalem, Gibeath, \add and\add* Kirjath; fourteen cities with their villages. This \add is\add* the inheritance of the children of Benjamin according to their families.
